title: System Shock Remake Demo (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_system_shock_demo_2.0.0.2.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers' kickstarter campaign: 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1598858095/system-shock?token=a72debe1

Title: SYSTEM SHOCK DEMO
Genre: Shooter - FPP - Sci-fi
Works on: Windows (7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Features: single-player
Size: 450 MB
Company: Night Dive Studios / Night Dive Studios
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/system_shock_demo

About:
After two decades, Night Dive Studios is rebooting and re-imagining the original System Shock. We will keep the new game true to the classic experience, keeping all the things you loved while giving today's gamers the modern look and feel expected from a great game.
With the help of members from the original team, Citadel Station has never been more immersive or terrifying!
â€œWhen youâ€™re working on a game, you tend not to think about how people will feel about it 20 years later â€“ or if people will even remember it! The announcement of the System Shock update from Nightdive (and the upcoming System Shock 3 Iâ€™m working on) itâ€™s apparent that not only do people remember, they care very deeply about the game. Back when we were working on the original, we wanted to make a simulation-based game that would empower players to tell their own stories through their playstyle choices â€“ an idea thatâ€™s still totally relevant today. Iâ€™ve long said that if you updated the graphics, sound and UI on System Shock youâ€™d have something that competes directly with any game on the market today. Now the Nightdive folks are doing that update and Iâ€™m confident my prediction will be validated. SHODAN demands that you support this so we can all find out.â€ --Warren Spector, OtherSide Entertainment. Producer on the original System Shock.
You're a renowned hacker, the most notorious cyberspace thief in the corporate world. Caught during a risky break-in, you become indentured to a greedy TriOptimum executive. After six months in a healing coma, you awaken to the twisted aftermath of a terrible disaster. Where are the surgeons? Why is the station in such disrepair? Slowly, the chilling realization that something is very wrong creeps over you. Once a prime corporate research facility, Citadel Station now teems with mindless cyborgs, robots and terribly mutated beings, all programmed to serve SHODAN, a ruthless A.I. There's scarcely time to think before it unleashes the first terror...
â€œThe crew at Nightdive heroically brought the original versions of System Shock and System Shock 2 back into circulation. They have thrived as a new audience has rediscovered these classics. Now Nightdive is remastering the original System Shock to bring it up to date on modern PCâ€™s - with fully updated visuals, audio and a modern interface â€“ making it dramatically more accessible to modern gamers. Itâ€™s quite wonderful to see a franchise that Warren and I helped create get such loving care." --Paul Neurath, Founder of OtherSide Entertainment. Co-founder of Looking Glass Studios.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit versions) 
Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better 
Memory: 8 GB RAM 
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better 
DirectX: Version 11 
Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended system requirements - Windows: 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit versions) 
Processor: Intel Core i7-3770/AMD FX-8350 or better 
Memory: 16 GB RAM 
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB or better 
DirectX: Version 11 
Storage: 2 GB available space
